The first vignette for `vanddraabe` is available [here](). It demonstrates the steps and thought process to analyze the conserved waters of ten thrombin crystallographically determined structures and is based on the work of Sanschagrin and Kuhn (_Protein Science_, 1998, **7** (_10_), pp 2054-2064). The results presented herein are part of the original vanddraabe article.
